page.title: 09A DAY IN MARK DODD'S LIFE.
page.content: THIS IS ABOUT WHAT I DO ON A TYPICAL SUNDAY. AT AROUND 10.30 AM I GET UP AND GO DOWNSTAIRS TO HAVE MY BREAKFAST. AT ABOUT 11AM MY DAD TELLS ME TO GO AND GET THE PAPER FROM THE SHOPS. I USUALLY GO ON MY BIKE. I HAVE MY DINNER, USUALLY SALAD OR SOMETHING ON TOAST OR SOUP. THEN I PLAY ON THE COMPUTER. AT ABOUT 3 PM. I GO TO MY FRIENDS, AND AT ABOUT 4 PM. I HAVE TEA, BACON AND BEANS. AT 5 PM. I LISTEN TO THE TOP 40. AT 9 PM., I DRAW UNTIL 9.45 PM., WHEN I PUT MY PYJAMAS ON. I GO TO BED AT 10 PM.
